name: frigate
description: Frigate is an NVR (network video recorder) system focused on real-time object detection using AI acceleration. It integrates with Home Assistant, supports MQTT, and processes camera feeds locally for privacy.
features: NVR: Network video recorder, Real-time object detection, AI acceleration. Smart security camera system.
Home Assistant: Seamless integration. Smart home ready.
Local Processing: Privacy-focused. No cloud required.
Object Detection: Person, vehicle, animal recognition. Intelligent alerts.
Hardware Acceleration: GPU and Coral support. Fast processing.
Recording: Continuous and event-based. Flexible storage.
Zones: Define detection areas. Targeted monitoring.
Snapshots: Capture key moments. Visual records.
Web UI: Monitor cameras live. Easy access.
Self-Hosted: Complete privacy. No cloud dependency.
